When my ex said she was breaking up with me at school, I tried my best not to cry, I thought of my favorite things or funny things to cheer me up and said things in my mind to keep me from crying, and it worked! Then at lunch, there were no more seats at the table I usually sit at with my crew, so I had to sit with people I never have sat with before, and they saw me blushing a little while looking down. They asked "What's wrong, Brady?" and I bursted into tears, and they were like "I think he got dumped, cuz he ain't in silent lunch, and he cryin'." and I nodded "yes" and everyone at the table whispered to everyone around them looking at me at different tables weirdly. 3 minutes later, I then saw almost half the lunch room was paying attention to me, and everyone that knew kept telling everyone beside them. Everyone was trying to go up to me and reassure me, like I was their best friend and I got really emotional thanking everyone coming up to me saying encouraging things like "Stay strong." and "Fight through the pain." Almost the entire lunchroom knew, even the staff encouraged me to stay strong. I then stopped crying and thanked everyone who helped me. I stood up and with all my confidence, I said "I am very thankful for all you wonderful people that took the time and helped an individual in need. This means a lot to me." At that moment, everyone in there applauded, including faculty and staff, and from that day out, it has changed my life and made me more confident to say things that I would usually be really nervous to say. It was at that moment, I changed.
This is a real story.

Glands in the pores of your skin produce a nasty substance which causes the dead skin cells you constantly shed, along with outside contaminants to become glued together and stuck in the pore. Then new tissue grows around it and voila.

It's a local immune response wherein an injury or introduction of a foreign body or compound triggers the release of Histamine, a nitrogen compound, from mast cells beneath your epidermis which is then picked up by the cells of your epidermis via specialized receptors, which in turn causes an inflammatory response so that you are prompted to scratch at the locale to hopefully remove the culprit.

well, that is totally normal, and has a term. This is called a precognitive dream, and is unrelated to any existing knowledge that you already have. Lots of people have experienced these kinds of dreams, and it is a perfectly normal phenomenon. hope this helped a little :)

Gentics. This is based mostly on the mother and father's eye color and the dominance of those colors.
For instance, if the dad's eye color is brown, a dominant trait, That genetic code is either Ee or EE, while the mother's eye's are blue, a recessive trait, that genetic code is ee. Meaning that, (using a Punnett Square) There are 2 possibilities to what eye color you get. It could be, either Ee or ee. HOW that possibility is chosen, we don't know.

There's actually a lot of debate about that. A lot of dentists seem to be really keen on extracting wisdom teeth whether or not they're causing a problem or are likely to cause a problem down the road. Alcohols do freeze, just at lower temperature than water.  This is mainly due to the size of the molecules.  Ethanol (CH3-CH2-OH) is significantly larger than water (H-OH). Between your bones are connective tissues. Surrounding these is a clear thick liquid called synovial fluid. When you crack your knuckles you are pulling apart your bones your increase the volume of the liquid, causing a massive drop in pressure. Gases dissolved in the liquid begin to bubble in a process called cavitation. When the pressure drops far enough, these bubbles burst causing the cracking or popping.

A fart is a form of air pollutant made up of primarily nitrogen, but it may sometimes contain traces of other air pollutants. A gases emitted when you "fart" are naturally odorless, but gain an odor due to impurities in the body (wastes). The reason we fart is because the body needs to remove all wastes, in this case gases, much like it would remove excrement or urine. There you go!!!
